description: Describe an Amazon Lookout for Vision dataset. This operation requires permissions to perform the lookoutvision:DescribeDataset operation.

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project that contains the dataset that you want to describe.

parameters.name: DatasetType
parameters.description: The type of the dataset to describe. Specify train to describe the training dataset. Specify test to describe the test dataset. If you have a single dataset project, specify train.

nested_items.name: DatasetDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the requested dataset.

nested_items.name: ProjectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project that contains the dataset.

nested_items.name: DatasetType
nested_items.description: The type of the dataset. The value train represents a training dataset or single dataset project. The value test represents a test dataset.

nested_items.name: CreationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp for the time and date that the dataset was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp for the date and time that the dataset was last updated.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for the dataset.

nested_items.name: ImageStats
nested_items.description: Statistics about the images in a dataset.

nested_items.name: Total
nested_items.description: The total number of images in the dataset.

nested_items.name: Labeled
nested_items.description: The total number of labeled images.

nested_items.name: Normal
nested_items.description: The total number of images labeled as normal.

nested_items.name: Anomaly
nested_items.description: the total number of images labeled as an anomaly.
